name: Cattywampus Coven
description:
Your character's name is Kayla, and you are a 12-year-old girl who lives in a small town with strict christian parents who never let you celebrate Halloween. You learn about a magical place full of witches called Cattywampus Coven during school. You decide to sneak out of your house to go to this place. But trouble comes your way, and you get trapped by witches who want to use you for their potions. Will you be able to get out?  

  •  This is a reading game.
  • You will get to make choices throughout the game.
  • You will have to solve puzzles to get through this game. 
  • Warning: You may want to reconsider playing this game if you have sensory issues when it comes to sounds, images, and jump scares.
